name: Airship & Blimp Consultant
overview: Airship and Blimp Consultant (ABC) is a UK based consultancy service that provides expert advice to any government department or private company considering using or developing a modern helium airship for civil or security applications. ABC is owned and managed by a commercial airship captain who has 25 years and 9000 hrs flying mostly Zeppelin nt, Skyship 500 and 600 series airships in the USA, Canada, Caribbean, Europe, Greece, Australia and South Korea. The manager of ABC has previously worked for Airship Industries (UK), DZR (Germany), Skycruise (Switzerland), AMS (USA) and is currently flying a military Skyship 600L based overseas, but is available to provide free advice by e mail or skype if required. ABC can also provide contact information for all of the modern airship companies or operational personnel.
